subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Niclas Bergfors had a goal and two assists and the Devils closed within a victory of tying the N.H.L. record of 10 consecutive road victories to start a season.
snippet: Niclas Bergfors had a goal and two assists and the Devils closed within a victory of tying the N.H.L. record of 10 consecutive road victories to start a season.
